Row.Text: We are Victoria, sovereign and protector of the British Empire. We would venture to welcome you to Our Court, in the hopes that Our interests can be best served in the most civil manner agreeable.
Good day to you, We are Victoria, ruler of the British Empire. We would have you dine with Us this evening, so clean yourself up. We woul not have ruffians in Our palace.
We are most quiet and calm in the face of this disaster. It has humbled Us to the deepest of Our heart.
We have already informed the honourable leader that they must do better.
We would repeat to the honourable leader that they must propose something better.
We are growing concerned that the honourable leader is showing signs of memory-loss, for they have already offered this trade to Us, and We have already declined.
We are pleased to meet you.
It flatters Us that you would return so soon after you left.
We would consider you an admirer of Our heart, for so often you come calling that it is bordering on the nature of creepy.
And what do you want this time?
Hello, again.
We are always pleased to have you in Our court.
Greetings.
What would you like to discuss?
What brings you here today?
Go on.
Let us begin.
What do you want?
Why are you here?
What business do you have here?
Oh great, you again?
Get on with it.
We are not unwise to the nature of Our impeding defeat, but We hope that you are honourable enough to disregard this and treat Us as equals.
Is it not time this war came to an end?
For the good of future generations, let there be peace.
The time has come to put down your arms.
Come to offer your surrender?
What business does a dishonourable scallop such as yourself have here?
Always a pleasure working with you. What brings you to Our court?
Before long, {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} will fall, and peace shall return to this earth.
We would have no part in your war, if that is why you have come.
We understand the dire situation in which you find yourself, and We pray for your impending victory.
We are not made amused by the placement of your armies at the borders of Our empire, and We would request that you move them at once.
We are not made amused by the placement of your armies at the borders of Our empire, and We would politely request that you move them at once.
We are very concerned at your effort to settle all hospitable lands on the earth, and We would request that you cease at once.
We are concerned at your recent settlement, and We would like to caution you against settling so close to the British Empire in the future. Now, how may We help you?

We are made very concerned by your recent purchase of land. The Chancellor of the Exchequer has brought the issue to Us personally, and has requested that We issue a formal warning that you refrain from any such purchases near the British Empire in the future.
We are made very concerned by your recent purchase of land, and We would request that you consider the consequences in the future.
We would like to formally congratulate you on the size of your arms. It has given the British Army much to which to aspire.
We would like to formally congratulate you on the wealth of your economy. It has given the British treasury much to which to aspire.
We would like to remind you that with an empire so small it should come as no surprise that We shall be forced to decline your beggary when you ask for assistance.
We would like to remind you that with an army so small it should come as no surprise that We shall be forced to decline your beggary when you ask for assistance.
We do not relish the company of warlords or dictators.
We would decline this request, though We are most grateful and humble for the consideration.
We have a serious matter to discuss. Our relationship with {1_CivName} has broken down, and We need you to denounce them as a show of support for the position of the British Empire. What do you say?

We are not amused by your recent show of dishonour, and We would tell the world that you are not to be trusted as an ally.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
We can no longer tolerate your actions.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
We would regret that this has come to pass, but would remind you that you have just denounced the British Empire.
You have sullied your reputation with such a foolish move.
We have noticed that you have become friends with {1_CivName}. We are very amused.
We recommend that you not get too close with {1_CivName}. They are not friends of the British Empire.

We would inform the honourable leader that {1_CivName} and the British Empire have worked together in the past, and We have the utmost respect for them. We will not tolerate any misdemeanours towards them.
Glad to hear there are others in the world which share my disgust with {1_CivName}. They are clearly not to be trusted.
Being on such good terms, We couldn't help but notice that you'd become friends with {1_CivName}. We have done the same. Perhaps this makeshift alliance will lead to great things in the future?
We share your convictions that {1_CivName} only causes problems for the civilised empires of the world. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will teach them a lesson.
Your relationship with {1_CivName} is unwise.
We have declared friendship with your mortal enemy, {1_CivName}.
We are not blind to your armies. If you should attack, We shall defend this empire with all its might.
It has come to Our attention that you have a large number of Units near Our borders. We request that you move them elsewhere to avoid causing undue distress to Our citizens.
It seems your word is worth nothing, as your conquest of {@1_MinorCivName} shows. How deplorable. The world shall know of your crimes.
Your wanton aggression against {@1_MinorCivName} does not go unnoticed. You will face serious consequences should you continue assault.
Your expansion efforts are an insult. Know that there shall be consequences for this.
We couldn't help but notice that you seem to be expanding into lands which We regard to belong to the British Empire. We request that you reconsider this.
Your habit of claiming every bit of land you've spotted has not gone unnoticed. We advise you to discontinue this.
If you should continue to expand your empire in lands We feel belong to the British Empire it can only ruin the possibility of diplomacy between us.
The settling of your people near Our sovereign territory is placing a strain upon relations between our two nations.
Your guarantee of not expanding near Us seems to have been empty words. Know that there will be consequences for this.
The aggressive manner in which you buy up territory near Us is an insult. We had hoped you would be a better neighbour.
Your purchase of land in Our vicinity has caused some alarm. We caution you so that this issue does not become more serious.
So it seems you lied when you told Us that your empire would stop purchasing land near Britain. We do not take this insult lightly.
We are very disappointed that you did not stop funding land acquisition near Our territory. We had hoped you were a more honourable leader.
We would like to formally extend Our hand unto you in friendship.
We would like to formally extend the hand of the British Empire unto you in friendship.
It's time We told the world of your sins.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
We've spoken to the other leaders about you. They need to know you are not to be trusted.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Our disagreements with {1_PlayerName:textkey} have become too much to bear. This is a situation that can only be resolved on the battlefield. Will you join Britain as an ally?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has become a nuisance. One that can only be dealt with through war. We seek allies - can We count you among them?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a threat to the stability of this world. The time has come to deal with them once and for all. Will you assist Us in this effort?
The time for war against {1_PlayerName:textkey} has come.
Your actions are unforgivable. There can never be reconciliation between Our two nations.
Given the circumstances, We have no choice but to assume you are an enemy to the British Empire. As such, We shall do what We must to protect Our interests.
We wanted to make it known to you that We value your friendship, and hope that it might remain strong.
It is clear to all that you are a wise and mighty ruler. We ask that you might also be compassionate towards those like Ourself who are weaker.
Oh great one, Our hope is that you will long serve as a paragon of strength and virtue for lesser leaders.
Your highly aggressive behaviour has not gone unnoticed. Should you keep it up, it will ultimately lead to your downfall.
It's clear you're a fairly uncivilized brute. We have to warn you, your actions are starting to attract quite a bit of attention.

It has come to Our attention that you are getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're within Our sphere of influence, and We'd prefer if you stayed out of it.
We've noticed your relationship with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. While that's nice, it would be best that you leave their protection to us. We'd hate for either of us to step on any toes.
We would inform you of Our utter contempt for your ceaseless existence.
We are most embarrassed by the unflattering size of your military.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
It's a shame there are some leaders in this world who have their fun by picking on the weak. Don't you agree?
We can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in Our empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to Us that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to Our attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. We would hope that you would consider the embarrassment this brings Us when dealing with you.
Travellers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, browse the inter-webs?
Rumour has it that your culture is so laughable that even the barbarians are shying away from your lands.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
We have already discussed this matter with you, and the answer is still no.
Very well. We agree to avoid settling in the vicinity of your empire for the time being. Perhaps in the future you will be a more accommodating neighbour.
Unacceptable. We are sovereign and have the right to settle what lands We please. This offence will not be forgotten.
We are not amused by this insult.
We agree. May a strong friendship lead to the flourishing of our empires.
We must decline.
If this is the only way, then We must agree.
If this is the only way, then We must agree. However, Our empire is not yet prepared, so give Us 10 turns. We will come to you again when We am ready.
Very well. We do what We must to maintain peace in Our lands.
We shall do what it takes to keep the peace.
Please, We shall give in to no such demands.
You dare insult Us in such a manner?
Unacceptable.
Don't be a fool.
You ask for too much. We will not drive Our nation into poverty to satisfy your greed.
No. We have Our dignity, and refuse to hand over such a great bounty so freely.
Your desire to strip Our lands of so much wealth is intolerable. Do not ask for so much.
You threaten Us again so soon? We refuse your demands, you vile beast.
Let's hear your offer.
What do you propose?
The time has come for peace. What do you think of this arrangement?
We must not let war define who we are. The time has come to make peace.
We must make this demand of you, remembering the crimes that you have committed against Us in the past.
Your great strength is a model for all other empires. We ask that you show generosity towards those less fortunate.
We believe it to be a necessary arrangement that the British Empire be open to you, and your empire be open to Us.
We would like to negotiate passage through your territory.

We would like to lay plans for establishing a Research Agreement with your great nation. Doing so would require each of us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
We feel that a Research Agreement is a mutually beneficial arrangement that would help serve to cement our Friendship.
This deal strengthened our nations and our bonds of friendship. Shall we renew this deal and continue our shared prosperity?
This deal has faded in our eyes over the years. To renew this deal, we would need more from your side of the negotiation.
We would ask that you consider this trade deal.
You are an uncivilized brute.
We may fail to overcome your evil, but We shall ensure that all the world knows of your treachery.
You will forever be known as a villain who preys on the weak.
You have not the might to challenge the British Empire. You have made a foolish mistake.
If you wish to fight, We certainly shall not back down.
If you wish to fight, We certainly shall not back down.
Only one empire shall emerge from this fight, and We assure you that it shall be Ours.
You would attack us in such a manner? Your hubris knows no limits. We hope that you will one day be judged for this.
How could you do such a thing? Begone, you vile being.
Taking advantage of someone's trust is despicable. Everyone shall know of your betrayal.
It is clear that the only way to ensure peace is by ridding the world of you.
You have betrayed your word. Make no mistake, the world will know of your treachery.
Our proximity has fated us to be enemies.
Fate has christened Us the one which shall bring unity to this divided planet.
We have waited long enough. We have seen an opening in your defense and We will use it to Our advantage.
We have been waiting a long time for this day. Now would be a good time to put your affairs in order.
Although the task before Us may be impossible, We are compelled to find a way to destroy you and all the evil for which you stand. We will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. We will, however, find a way to defeat you.
You are a villain without equal. Within every fiber of Our being, We know that We must destroy you.
Your might is unmatched, but We will find a way to defeat you.
The time to make a stand is now. The odds are not with Us, but We shall find a way to destroy you.
Your incredible strength will not deter Us from finding a way to defeat you. May God smile upon Us.
Although We do not wish it, We fear that now may be Our only opportunity to defeat you. Let us meet on the battlefield.
Destruction might be the fate which awaits Us, but should We back down only inevitable defeat awaits.
Your weakness is Our opportunity. Placing any trust in Us was a mistake.
The odds are clearly not with Us, but We see no alternative to revealing Our deceptive practices. We can now only pray that Our armies succeed.
Then war it is.
What is your offer?
What would you suggest?
What is the price of peace?
There can be no peace. Perhaps another day.
This is not the time for negotiation.
We still have business to settle.
We are not amused by your taking light of the situation.
We are amused.
You have Our thanks.
We are not amused.
So be it.
Then you will be responsible for the consequences of your hot-headedness.
We are appreciative for the actions you have taken on behalf of Our people.
Thank you. May this be remembered as a historic event which brought our two great empires closer together.
We are not amused by your recent claim of Our territory. Know there shall be consequences to this.
We are not amused by this barbarian diplomacy.
We are not convinced.
We had feared you would be unreasonable.
We only hope that is indeed the case.
We shall not take this lightly.
We are pleased that you conceded to Our interests.
We remain confident that Our decision was the best for Our people and Our nation.
It seems that you cannot be reasoned with.
We have no more business with the likes of you then.
You disappoint Us.
You know that this can only sow tension between our two nations.
We thought you might like to know that We've launched an invasion of one of your little pet states. The lands of {@1_MinorCivName} will make a fine addition to the British Empire.

It's come to Our attention that We may have attacked {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. While it was not Our goal to be at odds with your empire, this was deemed a necessary course of action.
We've been informed that Our empire has commenced an attack on {@1_MinorCivName}. We assure you, this was not on purpose, and hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.
We should consider exchanging embassies, which would allow for more advanced diplomacy between our peoples.
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. What do you think?
Your bullying of {@1_MinorCivName} is despicable. We demand that you refrain from squeezing tribute out of city-states under Our protection. We are not to be trifled with.
We heard about what you did to {@1_MinorCivName}. Did you not realize they are under Our protection? Do not provoke Us further.
We asked {@1_MinorCivName} for a tribute recently and they gave in. You promised to protect them from such things, but we both know you cannot back that up.
It's come to Our attention that We may have bullied {@1_MinorCivName}, which is under your protection. You do not put their needs above mine, We hope.

We've been informed that Our armies have taken tribute from {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. We assure you, this was quite unintentional, and We hope that this does not serve to drive Us apart.
We are pleased to see that you have chosen the path of Freedom. You need not take strength from fear and deceit.
We are pleased to see that you have chosen the path of Order. You need not take strength from riches and wealth.
We are pleased to see that you have chosen the path of Autocracy. You need not take strength from a bloated bureaucracy or a fabled people's will.
We have your spy under lock and key in the Tower of London. They shall be held accountable for your crimes.
We are willing to release your spy from the Tower of London, if you solemnly promise that an incident like this shall never re-occur.
We're glad you agreed to stop this petty thieving.
Your indiscretion is not a surprise.
As you request, our agents shall not conduct operations in your territory.
Our agents help keep the British Empire safe from all threats, including you. They operate as we need them to, not as you ask.
Thank you for bringing this {@1_CivAdjective} plot to our attention. With this warning, the British Empire shall be ready for whatever they may try. Your generous aid will be remembered.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army your way in a sneak attack. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts in a sneak attack against your civilization. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.

We have been informed that one of your spies has been killed in action whilst trying to steal from Us. Whilst we have the utmost sympathy for your loss, you understand this puts a strain upon Our relationship.
We regret any confusion caused by our late agent's recent activity. Please let any hostile feelings rest with the deceased operative.
Are you here about that little spying incident?
One of Our cities was recently burglarized and technological secrets were stolen. May We be assured that you had nothing to do with this?
We're convinced you've been spying on Our great civilization. We are not amused by this indiscretion, and would ask that you cease at once.
We have taken notice of the religious conversions you are undertaking inside our empire. We are a sacred and noble church, and We must ask you to cease this activity immediately.
We understand that some actions may not be forgiven.
It makes Us glad that you will overlook this awkward circumstance.
We're glad you agreed to end this proselytizing.
Your religious fervour is unsettling.
As you wish, Our missionaries shall no longer share the one true faith with the people in your cities.
In spite of your protests, your citizens will continue to be enlightened by Our missionaries, even though you damn your own people to live in ignorance.
We are eagerly anticipating your unconditional surrender.
Your complete capitulation sounds reasonable.
We were very pleased to hear your recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. It seems that Our goals are aligned.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} suits Our interests quite nicely. You have Our sincere gratitude.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is a blatant attack on Our interests. We hope this does not escalate to future conflict.
We found your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} very troubling. Surely there is a better way to resolve Our differences than petty politics.
Thanks to the help of your delegates, Our recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was successful. We look forward to your continued support, and will try to return the favor.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} succeeded, with the support of your delegation. Together we can accomplish many great things.
Your delegation played a part in the failure of Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. We do not take such transgressions lightly.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was defeated at the hands of your delegates. Do not expect Our delegation to support your interests in the future.
We thank you for entrusting the World Congress to Our capable leadership. We expect great things to come in the {1_LeagueName}.
We are not impressed by this candour.
We are amused by the ease by which you submit.
We remain confident that Our decision was the best for Our people and Our nation.
Very well. We'll be monitoring the situation.
We are not willing to offer you enough to make this a fair trade.
Any deal We suggest would result in an unfair exchange for you.
We've noticed that you've been looking for cultural artifacts within our borders. This needs to stop.
Unfortunately, Our plans cannot be halted.
As you wish, We shall stop looking for artifacts within your borders.
Must We escalate this?
Thank you for heeding our request. An artifact discovered on our land belongs to Our people, not yours.
We shall dig as We please... strumpet.
We meant no offence when attempting to steal your cultural heritage.
The British people have been corrupted by your bourgeois messages of liberty and equality. They seem to believe they have the right to demonstrate in the streets!
Your ideological plotting has us scared of a revolution for Order in our land. Will these workers' strikes never end?
Your message of strength through supreme power has resonated with the British people. Must we imitate your feared totalitarian state?
Your people shall not tolerate your oppressive ways for long. It is the duty of the British Empire to ensure that all the peoples of this earth are free. Except the French.
The workers of your land are wise to your oppressive ways. You must adopt the way of Order, lest your economy grind to a halt.
Your restless people are foolish and misguided. Abolish your arbitrary rules and establish an Autocracy to ensure a strong and lasting leadership.
We honour those who share in the belief of human liberty
Your workers have had the truth of the British working class, and We greet you as an equal.
We are pleased to see that you have adopted Autocracy. It is the duty of the sovereign and the sovereign alone to ensure that the rights of all are safeguarded from the state of nature.
We are pleased to see that our British ideals have reached your people. No longer shall they live in filth and debauchery.
